ConfirmRemoval: Are you sure you want to remove the Stickman?
TutorialIntro: Learn how to create animated stickman figures and bring them to life!
NetworkIntro: Connect with other users to share your animations.
PlayPauseIntro: Click here to play or pause your stickman animation.
SpeedIntro: Click here to adjust the speed of your stickman animation.
RemoveIntro: Click here to remove a stickman from your animation.
AddStickmanIntro: Click here to add a new stickman to your animation.
TemplatesIntro: Click here to choose a template for your stickman.
ImportFromJournalIntro: Click here to import saved stickmen from your Journal.
ImportIntro: Click here to import a video and convert it to stickman animation using pose detection.
ExportIntro: Click here to export your stickman animation.
TimelineIntro: View and navigate through your animation frames here. Click on any frame to edit it. Important: Editing frame 1 applies changes globally to all frames, while editing other frames affects that frame and all subsequent frames.
AddFrameIntro: Click here to add a new frame to your animation sequence.
FullScreenIntro: Switch to full screen mode for a better experience.
JointColorsIntro: Different joint colors help you understand movement: Red end joints (head, hands, feet) are freely movable. Orange middle joints (elbows, knees, neck) enable rotation. The green hip joint moves the entire stickman.
AnimationSavedToJournal: Animation has been successfully saved to your Journal!
NotVideoFile: Selected file is not a video
PleaseWait: Please wait while we analyze your video...
PreviewInstructions: Review the animation preview and click 'Add to Canvas' to import.
